name: Yes Prime Minister: The Computer Game
summary:
A game based upon the TV series of the same name.

A week in the life of the British Prime Minister. But not just any Prime Minister, this game puts you in the shoes of Prime Minister James (Jim) Hacker from the classic BBC television comedy "Yes, Prime Minister".

Much like most political simulations, you must balance your popularity with the needs of your party, the meddling of foreign governments, and the small minded incompetence of the civil servants that surround you. All of this is played out with multiple choice dialogues between Hacker and the other cast members of the series (complete with lo-res digital pictures). The dry humor of the show abounds as you must deal with crises such as the French refusing to continue work on the channel tunnel until Waterloo station is renamed. Fans of the show will recognize much of the material and non-fans should still find enough laughs to keep them interested.

The game takes place over 5 working days and at the end the PM has a final discussion with his colleagues Sir Humphrey Appleby and Bernard Woolley who assess his performance at trying to manage the country.

name: Yendorian Tales: The Tyrants of Thaine
Year Walk
summary: In the old days man tried to catch a glimpse of the future in the strangest of ways. Experience the ancient Swedish phenomena of year walking through a different kind of first person adventure that blurs the line between two and three dimensions, as well as reality and the supernatural.

name: Yesterday
summary: After captivating players from all around the world with the mythic Runaway trilogy, Pendulo Studios presents a new adventure gaming masterpiece! This thrilling mystery, presenting a unique, dark and somber style, will not leave you indifferent! With an incredible story, superb environments, perplexing and shady characters, Yesterday throws you into an unforgettable adventure from which you will not emerge unscathed.

name: Yet Another Zombie Defense
summary: Yet Another Zombie Defense is an unusual mix of dual-stick zombie shooter and tower defense genres. The player is free to choose from nine unique weapons and mount them onto auto turrets or set up defensive barricades to stay alive as long as he can. There are also power-ups to collect, different zombie types to shoot at and cooperative mode.

name: Yesterday Origins
summary: John Yesterday becomes immortal following an occult ritual. However, the ritual has been tampered with and things don't go quite as planned. Now he has to embark on an adventure to try and reproduce the immortality ritual correctly. But his former acquaintances have other plans for him...

name: Yetisports
summary:
Yetisports (also known as Pingu Throw) is a web-based Flash game that originally appeared on the Internet in January 2004. The goal of the original game is to have a yeti smack a penguin with a club and try to get it to fly as far as possible. The original Yetisports game features no name other than the words "1978 Reinhold + Yeti", a reference to Reinhold Messner's claim to have found Yetis.

The game is very popular and soon after release, there was a quick succession of many variants created by multiple people on the internet. None of these are officially sponsored by Chris Hilgert, even though many copy the original almost exactly save certain small changes. One of the more violent variants was made by someone known as 'Pawel', featuring decapitation, spikes, a big spiky club and mines. Since the original was released at the Yetisports homepage, the website has released nine further adventures of the Yeti as well as a re-release of the original that allows movement of the penguin in flight.

name: Year Walk
summary: This re-imagined version was rebuilt from the ground up to take advantage of the Wii U GamePad.

name: Yeti Adventure
summary: In the far-away cold country there lives a Yeti. Every day he is trapped by dangers, whether it be an eagle or penguins. All prevent it to live quietly.

name: Yellow: The Yellow Artifact
summary:
Yellow - is a cool flat platformer, with adventure and puzzle elements. Explore big world, win the ugly enemies and collect coins! 
Includes great soundtrack, cool graphics and juice gameplay.

name: Yet Another World
summary: Yet Another World - funny hardcore platformer in minimal style and relaxing ambient music.

name: Yetisports Arctic Adventure
summary: Yetisports Arctic Adventure is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Pirate Games and published by JoWooD Entertainment AG, which was released in Europe in 2005.

name: Yetisports Deluxe
summary: A compilation of mini-games based on the Yetisports web based flash games.

name: Yellow Brick Road
summary: An adventure game based on L. Frank Baum's novel The Wonderful Wizard of Oz.

name: Yellow Submarine
summary: Yellow Submarine was a prototype coded by an unknown Atari programmer to demonstrate directional control and the ability to move off one side of the screen and reappear on the opposite side. The Beatles yellow submarine graphic was not used in any Atari 5200 video game and was perhaps nothing more than an inspiration by the original programmer. There is no game here only the ability to control the yellow submarine on and around the screen

name: Yetisports: Penguin Party Island
summary: Yetisports: Penguin Party Island, what do the penguins do when they are not being abused by the Yeti as sports equipment? They throw themselves off cliffs with parachutes, fly pelicans in a race, drift on rafts down raging rivers, or climb cliffs. Travel to Penguin Party Iceland and let rip! Alone or with up to three friends you can take part in nine wacky competitions that are worthy successors of the Yetisports flash games.

name: Yello Bandana
summary: Well, there is only one character in this game and that is Blu's brother Yello. Yello is a ninja with a special training in mind - achieve perfect balance between black and white, yin and yang. This is exactly what your mission is going to be here - pass through all the stages and achieve perfect balance in each one.

name: Yet Another Zombie Defense HD
summary:
Build your base by day. Defend it by night. Stay alive as long as you can.

Yet Another Zombie Defense HD is an unusual mix of dual-stick zombie shooter and tower defense genres. The player is free to choose from nine unique weapons and mount them onto auto turrets or set up defensive barricades to stay alive as long as he can. There are also power-ups to collect, different zombie types to shoot at and cooperative mode.

name: Yes, my mother is...
summary: A game written by Skarn for the Annual Interactive Fiction Competition.

name: Yet Another RPG
summary: Yet Another RPG is a Japanese Role-Playing Game where the player assumes the role of the main protagonist Arial. Arial is the victim of a corrupt mutiny in the Over Overworld (Heaven) and was revoked of his angelhood. As any proper RPG protagonist must do, he tries to figure out what and why the heck that happened.

name: Yeh Yeh Tennis
summary: The sequel to Love Game's Wai Wai Tennis.

name: Yelaxot
summary: An open world adventure / puzzle indie game developed by Barkalar Games. With the beautiful world of Yelaxot slowly fading away, Zayten & Dentia must travel the world to gather the power source that has broken and scattered across the land.

name: Year 0
summary: Year 0 is a tile based game where the objective is to clear areas and progress onto other areas of the map. It is currently in Open Beta for the 2D Variation and closed Beta for the 3D Variation

name: Yeti Sports: Pingu Throw
summary: After being smashed around for years Pingu finally gets to fly! Chase the Albatrosses to steal their fish or swoop low over the ice to pluck your catch and boost your score.

name: Yellow Peril
summary: Released as a sequel to The Hobbit, this game was released outside of North America as Lord of the Rings: Game One.

name: Yerah
summary:
Yerah is a farming game with little RPG-elements. You can build up your own farm and fight monsters to 
keep the village save. Learn about the viking mythology and use it in your new live as a farmer.

name: Yeah Jam Fury: U, Me, Everybody!
summary:
Get the Mango!
Yeah Jam Fury tests your speed and ingenuity in over 100 levels of smiling face blocks. Utilize all three of your egos to create blocks, scale walls, and destroy everything in the way of your righteous fruit.

name: Yesterday
summary: It's a 3D Puzzle Game talking about the philosophy of love and encounter from female's perspective. All we experienced in countless “yesterday” make us be ourselves today. Beautiful visual performance and intriguing music immerse players in this fantasy world soon, where dreams mix with reality, time and space interweave together. As digging into the unique gameplay about variable axial Rubik’s Cube, and playing through full of challenge levels, players will gradually see the whole story and start feeling grateful to “yesterday” and cherish the present, which are what the game want to express.

name: Ye Fenny: Revenge of the Evil Good Shepherd
summary: A top-down action adventure shooter with a progressive story told through 90's style cutscenes. Crisp graphics, crazy enemies, insane boss battles & that all-important 90's style sound track to keep you pumped!

name: Yet Another Research Dog
summary: The research dog is a newly graduated Ph.D.. His life-long dream is to become a great scientist, but the fortune is not on his side. After years of hard working, he is finally offered an intern position in a random lab. However, the job is not that easy and happy as he expected. The tough boss, the retarded coworker, and the low salary paycheck. All these indicates there is still a long journey ahead for the research dog.

name: Yeti's Parole Officer
summary: The Yeti, Loch Ness Monster, Chupacabra, and Mothman are aliens, sentenced to prison on Earth by the Pan-Galactic Prisons Bureau. As the Yeti's parole officer, you must defend the galaxy from these convicts, unravel their criminal conspiracy, and bring them to justice!

name: Yellow
summary:
Yellow, a puzzle game for you!
Can you make the screen yellow in all 50 levels?
Each level has its own logic.

name: Yenght
summary: Yenght is the first text-adventure game ever published in Spanish. It is also the first game developed by Dinamic Software, the most important Spanish company in the 1980s.

name: Yearn Tyrant's Conquest
summary: Simultaneous turn based combat brings strategy games to your couch! Head to battle in Yearn Tyrant's Conquest and crush your enemies with furious attacks and hordes of minions. Fight on a variety of distinct battlefields in the remains of a past great world ravaged by tyrants. Choose one of them and dominate the battlegrounds.

name: Yeah Bunny!
summary: This tiny cute bunny is a hero who wants to explore another lands with you, will you come, super run and play this arcade retro 8bit platformer? This is great adventure where you can be a hero.

name: Yeli Orog
summary:
Yeli Orog is a FMV adventure game about an immense archaeological discovery: A bizarre stone tablet written in the Celtiberian language found buried underneath an ancient dolmen in northern Spain. The inscription written on the tablet tells a ghoulish tale believed to be the Celtiberian origin myth.

You play the role of Johnny Robin, an archaeologist sent to Asturias, Spain to assist in the recovery of Celtiberian remains. Upon arrival to Asturias you find yourself unexpectedly transported to an alien world, experiencing first-hand the terrifying story written on the ancient tablet.

If you are a fan of Myst-like games, interactive stories with puzzle elements, and FMV games, you will appreciate Yeli Orog.

name: Yet Another Exhausting Day
summary: You are exhausted, but why not go to sleep? A 3D crawling platformer about ordinary people’s exhausted life. Play as an exhausted person, and do everything you can to fight the drowsiness.

name: Yemon
summary: The ninja apprentice, Yemon, along with the onmyodo master, must stop the yokai from entering through a demon gate and destroying their village. Yemon must now live up to the meaning of his name and become the guardian of the gate.

name: Yet another tower defence
summary: Ancient demons summoned from the deep dark abyss, and brought ruin to Tiede, land of our home. You should know your towers, and use them wisely. Bring your sword, worrior, and your brave heart! Join me in this defence of the ancient...lands!

name: Yet Another Snake Game
summary: You are seeing another interpretation of the well-known game from the time of the first game consoles.

name: Yet Another Exhausted Day
summary: A 3D crawling platformer about ordinary people’s exhausting lives. Play as an exhausted person, evade comfy pillows, smash photo frames and flower pots, brawl with vacuum cleaners, and do everything you can to fight the drowsiness.

name: Yearning
summary: This 2D horror game is set in Edo period of Japan. The girl notices that her old sister has disappeared. The girl will look for her and clues of her. What will the girl find in end of the story?

name: Yet Another Survival Game
summary: A virus ravaged the planet, and you are one of the last survivors! Alone, you will have to survive in a hostile world populated by fierce creatures!

name: Yellowtoy
summary: After telling the soul of a abandoned toy to have a new body, in the toy world, through various efforts to obtain various props and smoothly left the toy world!

name: Yes, Master!
summary:
The magic locket gives you mind control powers. 
Will you resist or yield to the lust?

name: Yet Another Hero Legend
summary: Heroes, Justice, Collecting Flags, Sokoban, and the Extermination of Evil, Yet Another Hero Legend is a minimalistic puzzle game filled with choices and creative solutions.

name: Yet Another Hero Story
summary: Yet Another Hero Story is a classic point and click adventure set in a fantasy, cartoon world.

name: Yet Another Level
summary: A game of mystery and surprise as you face different challenges and experience each run. As a lone adventure, you will find yourself in an endless dungeon filled with grotesque creatures. In order to survive you will have to fire with whatever weapon you receive, open treasures to arm yourself, travel through all the rooms and defeat the ultimate creatures. After all this you will figure out: there’ll be no ending yet another level, and no turning back.

name: YesterMorrow
summary:
YesterMorrow is a single-player time travelling 2D platformer adventure mixing action sequences with puzzle elements, all wrapped in an engaging story.

It is a game about a girl travelling from the future into the past to save her family and the remnants of her world from a NeverEnding Night

name: Yes, Your Grace
summary: In this kingdom management RPG, petitioners will arrive in the throne room each turn to ask for your advice and assistance. Decide whether to help them with their problems, or to conserve resources for more important matters. Remember: supplies are limited, and not everyone has the kingdom’s best interests at heart...

name: Yes! PreCure 5 GoGo! Zenin ShuuGO! Dream Festival
summary: A combination of a fighting game and a collection of various mini-games starring characters from the Yes! PreCure 5 GoGo!, Futari wa PreCure Max Heart and Futari wa PreCure Splash Star anime series.

name: Yellow & Yangtze
summary: Lead your dynasty to victory in the new digital adaptation of the acclaimed board game!

name: Yes, the Queen is the Best!
summary: A simple horizontal Shoot 'em Up by Uta (Sky Scraper Project) where you play as the Seal Queen, who's live streaming a challenge given to her by the Seal Princess. The more she takes damage and gets angry, the more viewers she gets.

name: Yearning: A Gay Story
summary:
Come out in college! Meet people, make friends, and maybe find a boyfriend?

Yearning: A Gay Story (YAGS for short) is a coming-out-focused character-driven slice-of-life visual novel with dating sim elements (phew) where you play as a gay man starting his freshman year of college at a generic university somewhere in the midwestern United States.

You will interact with a cast of characters, each with their own personality and stories, as you navigate college life, develop friendships, play board games, and come out. With luck, you might even find a boyfriend.

name: Yet Another Pixel Dungeon
summary:
Yet Another Pixel Dungeon (or YetAnotherPD for short) is a roguelike RPG with pixel graphics and simple controls. Like most other games in this genre, it features randomly generated levels, relatively high difficulty and a large number of things to learn. And like most other games of its genre, it is quite challenging.

This game is based on the source code of another Android game, Pixel Dungeon. It began as a small project with the goal to improve the original game here or there, but has since gradually grown into something much, much bigger. The games are quite different from each other, so there is no need to play the original game before trying this one (but I would recommend to try it as well, it's good).

The main feature of YetAnotherPD which makes it different from original game and other mods is that it is mostly focused on tweaking game mechanics in order to make the game more interesting, diverse and balanced. Anyone who is familiar with the original game will have much to learn again in YAPD.

name: YellowDream
summary: YellowDream is a 2D rpg platformer game about someone lucid dreaming and making the decisions they want, going where they want but at the same time fighting nightmares in order to not fall in fear. The game got a gorgeous soundtrack and graphics that will make you fall in love with.

name: Yedoma Globula
summary: Yedoma Globula is a sandbox game where you explore vast procedural fractal landscapes.

name: Yellow Brick Road II
summary: The good witch Glinda is captured by the Wicked Witch of the West, and the Tin Man, Cowardly Lion and Scarecrow must set out to rescue her.

name: Yellow Brick Road: Harapeko Tsuki to Hoshi Atsume
Yellow Fins
summary: Our tiny yellow hero wants to fly like a bird. But he has fins and no wings. So he needs the hills to gain speed and fly from hill to hill to avoid getting caught by the snowstorm that is chasing him.

name: Y.E.T.I
summary: Y.E.T.I is a third-person shooting game that focuses on the classic shooting and precision mechanics. Fight against anything that threatens humanity. Or rather, whatever the government says that threatens humanity. You play as an investigation agent, involved in special missions.

name: Yeminj
summary: Yeminj is an score chasing arcade game, kill thousands of enemy's on a small arena using your sword and magic, cashing in on gems on burst to increase your power facing infinitelly harder waves, competing for the top place on the leaderboard, do you have what it takes?

name: Yeomna: The Legend of Dongbaek
summary: Yeomna is a Metrovania 2D action platform game. Take on the role of the Half-Demon exorcist Dongbaek, and complete the cases requested by Yeomna though combat and adventure in this dream-like, mysterious Underworld.

name: Yerba Mate Tycoon
summary: Yerba Mate Tycoon is a unique management game. You are taking care of a yerba mate production shop/company, create, customize various yerba mates, unlock new upgrades, and grow your company. Don't know what yerba mate is? Let's say it's a coffee alternative in South American countries.

name: Yellow Ballman
summary: Yellow Ballman is a high speed 2D action game where you control a ball-shaped character. Your goal is to reach the end while avoiding needles and other gimmicks.

name: Yet Another Tuesday
summary: Sneak out of work early through 10 different warehouse aisles and uncover the secret of aisle 0.

name: Yes Brother
summary: 'Yes, Brother' is a short JRPG about a young gay priest trying to save a village from a demon who has been possessing its naughty inhabitants. Make choices, Perform sacred confessions, Lead people to Cher's Heaven, Walk on a gay priest student's shoes playing a JRPG with an elemental system.

name: Yesterday the D-Gate
summary: Arthur faces the villain Cathode (and helped by Anode).

name: Yeoubul
summary: A platform game where you collect items to clear the stage, avoid or defeat enemies, pass through traps, and clear the stage with a system (operation) that uses the natural principle that creates a shadow when light does not pass through an object.

name: Yet Another Hard Game
summary: Yet Another Hard Game is yet another hard game. Shocker, I know. YAHG is a jump and run game that is hard.

name: Yellowlooper
summary: Yellowlooper is a short minimal, reaction/puzzle game. Yellowlooper looks minimalistic but is extremely difficult, one mistake and the level starts again.

name: Yes! PreCure 5
summary: A turn-based strategy game in which the player moves the team members of Pretty Cure 5 around on a grid. Computer-controlled opponents are members of Nightmare and their Kowaina. The whole game is controlled through the touch screen of the DS.

name: Yellow Brick Road
summary: Yellow Brick Road is a survival shooter where you take the role as a special force soldier who are thrown into an enemy forest without his teammates. It's up to you and you alone to find a way out by fighting everyone that gets in your way.

name: Yellow or Red?
summary: Make split second decisions as you jump the ball up as far as you can go while asking yourself, Yellow or Red?

name: Yearly
summary: There’s a difference between looking back and wanting to go back.

name: Yellow Sails
summary: A short and surreal dream exploration game created for the "Dream Diary Jam 4" event and submitted as a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. Go to bed and dream of strange islands across distant oceans...

name: Ye Olde Gunslinger
summary: Run n Gun your way through a dungeon in this extremely generic dungeon crawler!

name: Yemita
summary: Break everything in a japanese restaurant as a yolk

name: Yesterday, the World Ended
summary: Yesterday, the world ended, but Luke somehow finds himself the only one alive on a train heading who knows where. At least, he believes he's the only one alive still.

name: Yet Another Godzilla Game
summary: Godzilla!Godzilla!Godzilla!

name: Yeager
summary: Yeager is a 3D action role-playing monster hunting game set in an alien world. The game has realistic HD-quality beast-hunting action and next-gen cinematics powered by physically-based rendering and motion capture technology.

name: Yeolleb Warrior
summary: Yeolleb Warrior is a action-adventure game with a cartoon animation style.

name: Yeah Yeah Beebiss II
summary: Yeah Yeah Beebiss II is the sequel to a game considered as lost media. As Kyonshi Hui and Jiangshi Bo, it is your quest to banish all evil in all 100 levels - 10 original stages, including the boss -- a mutated mass of pure evil. Yeah Yeah Beebiss II is a new retro homebrew game created as a love letter to the whole retro game scene!

name: Yes My Lord
summary: The protagonist was once a famous genius, but now he is poor. One day, he woke up drunk and found himself in an underground cemetery with demons wandering around. The mysterious girl "Foxy" who met in the cemetery taught him the necromancer magic.

name: Yesterday!
summary:
Yesterday! is a 3D Puzzle Game about the philosophy of love and encounter.
Space is independent, time is irreversible. The encounter in life, however, is so amazing that it makes everything colorful. Yesterday! is not about a story of one couple, it tells story of every couple.

name: Yeardle
summary: Yeardle is a "Wordle clone" focused on identifying the specific year of three random historical events. Players have eight tries to find the right answer, and previous guesses will change color depending on how close the correct year is.

name: Yerr Out
summary: A wacky & competitive baseball game! Choose from 30+ different animals to assemble your team, each with different attributes. Crush hits into the gap, throw nasty curveballs, make diving plays in the outfield, and bust out slides to breakup close plays.

name: Yeth
summary: Yeth is a ROM hack of Sonic the Hedgehog. The game features an original character by the name of Yeth as he adventures through several new levels (and one familiar one).

name: Ye Olde Cribbage Club: A Later Daters Game
summary: Cozy up with your favorite Ye Olde residents with a cracking cribbage contest. What is cribbage? Only the best board and card game combo ever played, enjoyed by many a senior citizen and old soul.

name: Yeah Jam Fury
summary: Yeah Jam Fury tests your speed and ingenuity in over 40 levels of smiling face blocks. Utilize all three of your egos to create blocks, scale walls, and destroy everything in the way of your righteous fruit!

name: Yet Another Fantasy Title
summary: Become a rogue in an open-world fantasy RPG, filled with absurd humor and bard music. Go on an epic quest to kill the dragon. Kill filthy orcs, deal with arrogant elves, drink with dwarves, learn spells from hobo-wizards and steal the ring from goblins. All packed in an old-school gameplay style.

name: Yerevan Drive
summary: Yerevan Drive is the first Armenian 3D game. The objective is to rally in the streets of Yerevan. The menu and the soundtrack are in Armenian. The game also includes a subway.

name: Yeah! Fighting Girl
summary: This is a relaxing and casual game. Five cute girls owe a huge debt for breaking the naked statue of the demon king. In order not to be sold to goblins, they are forced to go to an arena and start fighting to earn money to pay off their debts.

name: Yellow Taxi Goes Vroom
summary: Make full use of your advanced move-set to navigate hand-crafted retro worlds without a jump button in this vibrant love letter to the N64 era of collectathons!

name: Yesterdreamt
summary: Deliberate movement, limited ammo and precious sanity. Yesterdreamt is a twin-stick horrorvania where the odds are stacked against you, Gunslinger. Unlock arcanicks to tip the scales and keep close to your dog, and you might just win this fight. And if you were to fall, well… Blessed be the Dreamweavers.

name: Yestertide
summary: Welcome to Yestertide, another exciting mind-bender from the MysteryCaper team. Enjoy your visit. You're not going anywhere anytime soon.

name: Yet Another Zombie Survivors
summary: The Horde is coming, but you're ready to fight it! Arm your team to your liking and discover which synergies work best against thousands of the undead. Survive, evolve, and break the limits in this casual yet heart-pumping rogue-lite reverse bullet hell.

name: Yes, My Demon Queen!
summary:
Finally, your favorite strategy game is about to make its demon race playable! You’ve always wanted to fight on the villains’ side, but that dream soon becomes your new reality when an altercation leaves your life flashing before your eyes. Suddenly, you find yourself in a fantasy world surrounded by demons and humans in the middle of a war!

Well, all you need to do is survive, right? That’s easier said than done when you’re serving under the sadistic demon queen. She doesn’t care who she has to step on to get her way, and if she finds out you aren’t really her general, who knows what she’ll do to you!

name: Yeah Yeah Beebiss I
summary:
Yeah Yeah Beebiss I is a rumored lost game for the NES that was first mentioned in the June 1989 listing for mail-order video game service, Play It Again, where it would reappear until September before being removed from the listing and then show up on another mail-order video game service known as Funco.

There's no known information about the game other than it's title, however there are various theories to the game, from it being a mistranslation of a Japanese game, with the most popular theory for this one being the game Rai Rai Kyonshis: Baby Kyonshi no Amida Daibouken, to the game being a copyright trap made up to spot other magazines who were copying them. As of 2022, none of them have been confirmed.

name: YesterSol
summary: Unleash your magical spear! Explore a vast inter-connected world, battling enemies sent by Culex, the dark mosquito deity. Throw, recall, and use your spear as a platform through this minimalistic metroidvania made by one developer!

name: Yellow History
summary: In this labyrinth, governed by his feelings, Thomas seeks his release. How to wake up from this nightmare? Is there a way out?

name: Yello Adventures
summary: Overcome challenging and dangerous platforms with a variety of different and challenging enemies and make sure you are prepared for the boss at the end of the level where you will show your experience and expertise! Spend the money you get from enemies in the in-game store, upgrade your weapon and become more effective in your fight against your enemies!

name: Years of Division
summary: Command the heroes of a land shattered by a war of betrayal. Build up a team of loyal warriors united by common purpose and personal bonds, and shape their growth to suit your strategy. Lead them to victory in turn-based tactical battles to discover the truth behind the Years of Division!

name: Yet Another Hentai Puzzle: PTSD
summary: Discover the best Hentai Puzzle Visual Novel on Steam! Enjoy stunning art, beautiful ladies, soothing music, and an intriguing story - all to make your evening delightful!

name: Year 500
summary: Year 500 is a third-person, hack-n-slash adventure game featuring swordplay, magic casting, and an engaging story set in a fantasy world. Reclaim your memory, oppose and defeat evil, and save the kingdom by any means necessary.

name: Yenemy
summary: Yenemy is a new free browser multiplayer top-down view PvP hardcore survival IO game. The game features exploring, gathering resources, crafting, building a shelter and protecting fellow clanmates from other players.

name: Yerba Buena
summary: In Yerba Buena, a young woman makes a startling discovery that allows her to reshape reality. By hacking the surrounding world, she is able to manipulate the environment, turn the tables on her enemies, and save the world from destruction.

name: Yes, Your Grace: Snowfall
summary: In this new reality, where monsters seem closer, enemies stronger and your petitioners struggling more than ever, your duties as a King must continue. It will be your responsibility to rebuild the trust of your kingdom, protect your family and survive the upcoming winter.

name: Yeah! You Want "Those Games", Right? So Here You Go! Now, Let's See You Clear Them!
summary: Cute and comical stickman characters have arrived for you to enjoy "those games" you've seen and wanted to play before. Play a variety of minigames fully, thoroughly, and enjoyably to your heart's content!

name: Yeerk Pool
summary:
Yeerk Pool is an Animorphs arcade-style game, offered on the official Animorphs website.

Your challenge is to help Jake find his way through the maze to the Yeerk Pool. You can control Jake's movements with the arrow keys on your keyboard, or with the J-I-K-L keys.

As you find the colored keys, use them to free the gorillas from their matching-colored cages. Once you've released a gorilla, you can use its morph (by hitting the space bar) to help Jake chase off the controllers...but remember, you can only stay in the gorilla morph a limited time.

If you encounter any animals along the way, be sure to stop and collect them for extra points.

You have three chances to help Jake collect all the keys and release all the animals, which then allows Jake entry to the Yeerk Pool area, where you must help him find the Kandrona ray machine that feeds the Yeerks and destroy it. Warning: don't forget to stay away from any roaming Yeerk slugs and use Jake's gorilla morph (by hitting the space bar) to cross the Yeerk Pool.

At the end of the game, your points will be tallied, and you can proceed to the next level. Your game ends when you either run out of time or after you've exhausted all three Jakes. Play again to beat your score!

name: Yearning
summary: “Yearning” is a visual novel type of game, telling the story of the protagonist Tan Kai’s ordinary and extraordinary life in the modern Chinese university campus.

name: Yebushou: Defeat Pirates
summary: In the 16th century, a large number of Japanese pirates appeared in the coastal areas of China, and a Chinese general was born. He led his troops to victory with very low battle damage, but when he first took office, the army was not capable of fighting, and only you two could save the early war.

name: Year Unknown
summary: A story-based exploration game about the very far future, where humanity has conquered the universe. With the help of two Artificial Intelligences, explore the conquered universe and uncover your purpose in it.

name: Yeet
summary: Adrenaline fueled, fast paced combat with a satisfying twist. Battle your friends by yeeting, dashing, and flying around an arena with devastating strength and speed!

name: Yeon-oh and Seo
summary: Success and failure, love and friendship, dream and reality. The story about our choices in the meantime. A real passionate romance interactive game.

name: Ye Olde Smudge
summary: Ye Olde Smudge is a 1995 Heretic mapset by Christen Klie consisting of three levels.

name: YetiFree
summary: YetiFree is a retro role reversal of the 90's classic SkiFree. Smash, slam, and blast your way down the slopes to rack up the highest score. The Yeti must feed!

name: Yeah! Wow! Hey!
summary: High difficulty multiplayer 3D platform jumping game. The high requirement for view control plus less tolerance creates more challenging levels.

name: Yesterday's Nightmare
summary: Surreal medieval themed map.

name: Year 2088
summary:
Are you ready to experience the peak of the cyberpunk age in 2088?

In 2088, when mankind was at the height of the cyberpunk age, there was a great war and destruction in the world. The earth turned into a radiation barren desert, and some of the survivors settled in virtual worlds on outer space. See people trying to live with the limited technology taken from the world. With the Year 2088 game, you can experience a real cyberpunk life in the orbit of the moon, one of the biggest of these space tops.

name: Year 2088 Classic
summary:
Are you ready for the cyberpunk craze of 2088? flying cars and robots.

Are you ready to see a real cyberpunk craze at the peak of the great pre-war technology in 2088? In Year 2088 Classic, you can drive flying cars and flying motorcycles, and fight invading AI robots. You can also see the entertainment venues in Dream City and Dark City and wander the streets of the future as a tourist. All it takes to experience all these great adventures is a mobile phone and download this app.

name: Yeetus
summary: You are YEETUS! Your weapon? The very floor beneath your feet! YEET your surrounding terrain into destructive projectiles. Be strategic, though. A hasty shot may mean a long fall down to your doom in YEETUS, a casual time survivor game with rogue-lite elements.

name: Yetisports: World Tour
summary: Yetisports: World Tour contains 10 mini games that can be played alone or in multiplayer. The games are: Pingu Throw, Orca Slap, Seal Bounce, Albatross Overload, Flamingo Drive, Ice Bear Attack, Pingu Dart, Pelican Crossfire, Hill Side Rocket Ride and Pingu Breakthrough.

name: Yet Another Krappy Shooter
summary: An endless horizontal shooter with increasing difficulty for ZX Spectrum 16k

name: Yes, Sir
summary: "Yes, Sir" is a mix of battle chess strategy and roguelike. As a leader, you need to recruit members with distinctive personalities and lead your members to fight powerful enemies in a secret world. A new journey is waiting for you.

name: Year3055
summary: We're in 3055, where AI robots have taken over the world. How will the hero solve this issue?

name: Yellow Rose
summary: Pandora spends a week socializing. Make a new friend in a cute, cozy game and nothing bad happens.

name: Yewdow
summary:
Place the arrow, change the direction of the car, and pass all the flags to clear the game.

If the car goes off-screen or hits a rock, it is a failure.

If the car hits a wall, it will flip, but the wall will disappear.

name: Yeti Quest: Crazy Penguins
summary: Help Yeti and his crazy penguin pals save their Antarctic island home from the ice storm! Explore 100 exciting, challenging match-3 levels on the snow-covered island and lead the penguin team safely through the many dangers.

name: Yeti Legend: Mystery of the Forest
summary: When a chemical spill spreads into the forest, creatures larger than life start emerging from the shadows - and right into your own backyard. Fight to survive as you attempt to solve the mystery in this hide-and-seek hidden object adventure.

name: Yet Another Hentai Puzzle
summary: Yet Another Hentai Puzzle game to keep you happy.

name: Yez: The Dark Amulet
summary: Yez has been infected with an element called Startite It spread through the land and twisted it's creatures into the Shadow Beings. The Creator sent down a Universal Guardian to deal the Shadow Beings. But after thousands of years of peace. The Shadow Beings have returned. Now it's all up to you.

name: Yee-Haw!!
summary: In this fast-paced roguelite, destroy thousands of enemies with the help of your cowboy and dozens of special powerups and weapons. Yee-Haw!!

name: Yesterday's News
summary: Craft hilarious headlines with your friends in this 3-8 player party game. Score points by composing the wittiest headlines or by supplying the perfect words for your friends' creations!

name: Yep It's More Skiing
summary: You won a beauty competition and thereby the accompanying grand prize of a skiing holiday at an exclusive ski resort - YIPEE! After two days of skiing and sitting in front of a cozy fireplace with hot chocolate in the evenings, you develop an aggravated case of boredom. So the following day you start looking for a challenge and lo and behold you have now found one: The ski slope called 'The Devil's Run'. This slope has been closed for a long time due to excessive injuries and accidents. You obviously ignore all warnings and have decided to attempt the run. Can you guess how this will end?

name: Yeeps 2.0
summary: Unleash your imagination in Yeeps, the ultimate VR sandbox where creativity meets chaotic multiplayer action! Master classic Hide & Seek, outsmart foes in Prop Hunt, dominate PvP arenas, strategize in team battles, and more. With 8+ official game modes, there's always a new way to play!

name: YeGung
summary: This game is a bow action RPG game, so you can advance without developing your character, and you can easily defeat enemies as you strengthen your character. Features include main quests, daily quests, field hunting grounds, reinforcement, and stores.

name: Yeah! You Want "Those Games", Right? So Here You Go! Now, Let's See You Clear Them! 2
summary: "Those Games" are back! Play through familiar minigames to your heart's content! Take on five different minigames with a total of 250 stages! Sit back and play fully, thoroughly, and enjoyably!

name: Yellow House
summary: Yellow House is a non-linear visual horror novel. Dive into the grim atmosphere of a twisted mind surrounded by false and cruelty.

name: Yedesna Shoots 2
summary: Yedesna Shoots 2 is an asteroids like game where you play as... Yedesna!

name: Yet Another Solitaire Game
summary:
Yet Another Solitaire Game (YASG) includes the following solitaire games: Klondike, Spider, Freecell, Yukon, Alaska, and Scorpion,

Yet Another Solitaire Game is designed for fans of the Solitaire card game who want to test their skills against other players. Online tournaments start all day, every few minutes, according to various settings. Joining players must solve exactly the same hand at the same time. During the competition, the program monitors many factors and scores the competitors based on this. At the end of the tournament, players can compare their results.

name: Yet Another Hentai Puzzle: Cyberpunk
summary: Yet Another Hentai Puzzle game to keep you happy.

name: Yet Another Climbing Game
summary: Yet Another Climbing Game is a punishing ascent, a twisted tribute to the agony of determination. You guide your climber with a single, clumsy mechanic, grappling upward with imprecise precision. That’s all there is. With persistence, you might find yourself soaring, stumbling, and sometimes hanging by a thread. Great mysteries and perhaps some reward await those daring (or foolish) enough to reach the top.

name: Yellow Trouble
summary: 8-way water gun blasting horizontal 2D arcade co-op shoot ‘em up, with ducks?!

name: Yeeraffe
summary: A very normal giraffe game. It's just hungry.

name: Yet Another Sonic the Hedgehog Minigame
Yes! PreCure 5 GoGo!: LoveLove Hiragana Lesson
Yedesna Shoots 3
summary: Yedesna shoots 3 is an asteroids like game where you play as, uh, Yedesna!

name: Yeah! You Want "Those Games", Right? So Here You Go! Now, Let's See You Clear Them! 1+2
summary: This bundle, containing "Those Games" and "Those Games 2" is for you! Play Pin Pull, Number Tower, and more to your heart's content!

name: Yes Comrade
summary: Yes Comrade is a 1 - 4 player cooperative survival sandbox where you and your fellow Comrades are re-assigned to a remote sea outpost. Guard the great Belegovskain coastline, process the ships, keep the Supreme Leader happy, and try not to think too hard about what happens on the island…

name: Yet Another Killing Game
summary: Inspired by popular mystery adventure game series such as Ace Attorney, Danganronpa, and Zero Escape, YAKG's gameplay offers a mix of immersive dialogue branches, point-and-click room investigations, and some mystery solving--if you can keep everyone from killing each other!

name: Yeonkyung
summary: The game is a 3D first-person horror game and features Korean and Japanese soldiers and is played in a place called Yeongyeong, the palace of the Goryeo Dynasty. (Please understand that the game size is high for quality reasons.)

name: Yeah Bunny 2
summary: Embark on an adorable pixelated adventure with Yeah Bunny 2! This charming platformer takes you on a journey through vibrant worlds filled with wonder and challenge. With simple yet intuitive tap-to-jump controls, anyone can master the art of platforming.

name: Year of the Ladybug: Season 1
summary: In 'Year of the Ladybug: Season 1,' characters traverse a nightmarish realm filled with fear and despair, revealing sinister secrets while evading the relentless terrors that pursue them at every turn.

name: Yet Another One
summary: Explore vast canyons and treacherous caves where the power of ancient runes is your only weapon. Draw runes to solve puzzles, summon magic, and avoid dangerous creatures, if you can — all while navigating dark, mysterious landscapes. Also, why is the rabbit swearing at me?

name: Yellow Eyes
summary:
Dive into the depths of a nightmare in this 3D horror game crafted specifically for the Gdevelop 3D Game Jam. Immerse yourself in an eerie and claustrophobic maze as you gather pieces of mysterious relics of unknown origin.

Be prepared, for there's something hidden within the dark depths and it is coming for you.

name: Yet Another Vanilla SMA2 Hack
summary: Yet Another Vanilla Super Mario Advance 2 Hack is a 6 exit hack of Super Mario Advance 2 (The Gameboy Version of SMW) that contains brand new levels, custom dialogue, and a slightly changed overworld. The purpose of this hack is to prove that it’s possible to change anything other than the levels.

name: Yesterday's Crossroads
summary: Yesterday's Crossroads is a choice-driven adult visual novel where every option leads to different outcomes. Meet a diverse cast of characters, each with their own personal struggles, and shape their stories along with your own.

name: Yeti Ski
summary: Old-school snow sports inspired by SkiFree. Have fun on the slopes, but watch out for the yeti!

name: YetiParty
summary: A first-person parody horror. College goofballs are partying hard in the great outdoors - booze, boobs, and bad decisions. What's gonna kill 'em first? Cheap vodka, ancient memes, dirty jokes… or a bloodthirsty Yeti from the woods?

name: Yes, And So Our Hollow Hearts Called For Love
summary:
What does it mean to suffer in heaven? Eve knows the answer and Leben is going to find out. After all what's love without a little bit of pain involved?

A 20,000 word visual novel made for the Menhera VN Jam. Love, eternity, death and time await.

name: Yes, My Queen
summary: The chess roguelite. Play game-changing cards, bend the rules, save your Queen, and escape from the dungeon.

name: Yellow*Demon
summary: Destroy Mansa Musa's Treasure Guardians in this brand new arcade time-attack survival shooter! Feast on gold and treasure as you fight to become Lord of the Underworld!

name: Yeet Up!
summary: Yeet Up! is a challenging 2D physics platformer where you control a spherical character using a grappling hook. Swing with precision, dodge tricky obstacles, and climb as high as you can to claim the #1 spot on the global leaderboard!

name: Yes, No, Goodbye
summary: Yes, No, Goodbye is a haunting word game where you play as an exorcist attempting to send off a spirit clinging to their old apartment. Unscramble the truth and seek out solace for the dead.

name: Yes, My Warlord
summary: Rule as a hobgoblin warlord in this kingdom management RPG. Balance resources and manage the shifting opinions of commoners, goblinoids, and elites. Face difficult decisions, and choose whether to rule with fairness… or with brutality.

name: Ye Guild Clerk!
summary: In Ye Guild Clerk!, you manage an Adventurer's Guild branch where anthropomorphic heroes seek quests and rewards. As a clerk, you distribute missions, dispense payment, and provide equipment to animal adventurers, with your decisions directly influencing their success or failure in their journeys. The game puts you behind the counter to experience fantasy adventures from a different perspective - that of the quest-giver rather than the traditional hero.

name: YellowPips
summary: Wild West. Rotten gold. Fight to survive.

name: Yellow
summary: YELLOW is a liminal survival horror game. As a M.E.G. inspector in hazmat gear, explore unstable Backrooms zones to document "Undocumented" entities. With zero data available, you must study these lethal threats, uncover their origins, and solve the mystery of why new levels are appearing.

name: Yesterday's Meat
summary:
Finally, it happens: the girl you like, Kaori, confesses her feelings for you. Without hesitation, you accept, and together you begin a relationship so perfect it seems like a dream. Each date is filled with laughter, furtive glances, and a warmth you never thought you'd find.
But one day, Kaori invites you to her home. You hope for another step in your blossoming love story; however, as soon as you cross the threshold, everything changes. The atmosphere thickens, the shadows thicken, and the silences linger. What was once painted in bright pink slowly begins to decompose into something dark and disgusting.
Behind Kaori's perfect smile lies a secret. A secret so powerful it would destroy not only their relationship... but also their sanity.
Will you discover the truth about Kaori... or will you lose yourself in it?

name: Ye Old Seadog
summary: Ye Old Seadog is a frantic tavern manager where you run a bar for thirsty pirates. Manage resources, serve drinks, and survive the chaos of a busy night. Will you become the legendary tavern of the Evenkeel Harbor, or walk the plank? Arrrgh!
